metadata.title: CVE-2018-19662 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in libsndfile 1.0.28. There is a buffer over-readin the function i2alaw_array in alaw.c that will lead to a denial ofservice.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19662` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsndfile1 - 1.0.28-6
sndfile-programs - 1.0.28-6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsndfile package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.28-6').
